"Hi!, you must be here for the open part. You'll have to fill out this waiver before we get anything started." she instructed you.
Out of instinct you grab the paper and clipboard from her hand and sign it without reading a single word.
"Right this way, then." she declared, leading you to an empty room.
"We'll just be taking a few shots. Stare at the wall."
You find this strange. This kind of thing has never happened to you before in your acting career. You decide to comply and within seconds a bright light flashes and you go black.

When you awake you are standing on four feet and see a very shorter view. Coincidentally there was a mirror lying on the ground across the floor from you. 112331.content:
Chris couldn't believe he had finally made it.

Well, he hadn't made it exactly yet. He still had to sign the dotted line on the contract. But he couldn't believe it when he got a call from his agent, Carol Mann, who told him that she had gotten him the opportunity of a lifetime. A huge payday for a mystery role in a fantasy film that one of the biggest directors in Hollywood, Pat Ranks, personally wanted him for.

He was going to make it. He just had to wait for the contract to come to him.

And soon enough, the door opened, revealing Pat Ranks and the producer of the picture, Jack Ends, holding the coveted contract in hand. They sat across the table from Chris and put the contract right in front of him.

"Are you ready to sign, Mr. Miles?" Pat Ranks asked, smiling.

"Hell yeah I am!" Chris said, quickly flipping to the back of the contract, not really reading it. He assumed that Carol would have read it and told him if the studio was cheating him out of anything. Plus, he really wanted the role. He knew he needed to break out, and this was as good a chance as any.

Chris signed the contract and handed the paper back to the two men.

"Good. Glad to have you aboard. Now, as per the contract, we require you to take a drink of this." Jack said, reaching under the desk and pulling out a bottle with a strange, bubbly looking drink in it.

"OK. Sure. No problem." Chris said. Cool, his first endorsement deal! Chris took a big gulp of the drink, and placed the empty bottle on the table.

"Hey, not bad at all! Can't wait to have more!" Chris said, practicing what he thought was his pitch.

"Don't worry, we'll make sure you get more. Now, go home and relax. You have a big shoot ahead of you." Pat said.

"Well... don't I get a script soon?" Chris asked.

"We'll send along a script with your agent... maybe tonight." Jack said.

"Oh, OK! Cool. Can't wait to start!" Chris said, shaking both of the hands of the men and quickly exiting. Jack and Pat look at each other.

"So when does the change start?" Jack asked.

"Should be tonight. In fact, Phase One may be complete by midnight." Pat smiled.

Later that night...

11321.content:
Chris was waiting in the lobby of the hotel building the casting office was using for auditions...He was an aspiring actor that was getting pretty popular, a couple more successful films and he could be made in the shade as a legit A-List celebrity, right now he was a bit recognizable but not drop-dead recognizable and Chris really wanted that fame...

On his agent's instructions, he auditioned for the role of Tyler Meyer, the eldest kid of the Meyer family, college-bound whose family wanted to go on one last vacation as a family before college rolled around...A family comedy wasn't exactly the biggest film that Chris would've been interested in going after but once he heard exactly who was directing it, he knew he needed to get in...

Michael Screnton, a top Hollywood director, tied up with some of the biggest Hollywood cinematic projects in years, he also had a routine with his films, after every set of big-budget blockbusters he directed, he then took a break and filmed a different sort of movie out of his supposed wheelhouse, award-bait dramas, Broadway musical film adaptations, video game films and even internet tv series!

Whatever Screnton did, he did successfully and often times when those blockbusters came around again, it would often be cast with people from his other 'break' films, his award-winning actor from a historical drama? Major movie villain. Musical supporting actress? Female lead in his big action movie. Video game film voice actor? CGI and Live-Action performer as the main centerpiece of his project!

If he wanted to get an in on Screnton's Production Posse and get rocketed up to the stars, he would need to impress him in these callbacks and when his name was called in he quickly entered the main room they were using and noted that two other actors were in there...

One male actor that he didn't really recognize, possibly some small town kid that Screnton had an eye on, the other male actor in the room was someone that Chris recognized from some commercials and as an extra in some tv series filming around here...

He then turned his attention to the man at the center of the table and recognized Screnton right there as he said, "If you're read up on me, you probably know that my audition processes when it gets to callbacks are a bit unorthodox, for now I want the following script right here to be read by all of you" and pointed to three copies of the script in front of him that Chris and the other actors grabbed and looked through as Screnton said, "In order to get a better read on how the character you want is to be portrayed, I want you to read lines for other characters you may not have auditioned for or may not even think fit you in more than one way or another, I want to see if you're willing to follow my orders to the best of your degree..."

Screnton soon looked over at his clipboard and said, "Angelo, I want you to read for Tyler" Chris looked over at the other male in the room, huh so his name was Angelo before Screnton continued, "Derrick, read for Greg" as Chris thought to himself, 'A little odd but that's okay' Greg was the 10-year old main kid on the cast and while it may seem odd to some, Screnton had done this before with other actresses or actors that he'd worked with...

"Chris, read for Tommy" and Chris soon nodded to cover up his confusion a bit...Tommy Meyer was a 5-year old soon to be 6-year old kid who was the runt of the Meyer family, the little kid who was the kid-appeal character for the movie, his stuff was either to cause mischief for his two older brothers or to have cute bonding scenes with the rest of the family...

With that in mind, Chris, Derrick and Angelo all listened as Screnton said, "Read the script from pages 45-52 and remember be the characters you are reading for" and had his camera on to record this as all three of them quickly got into the scene they were acting...

Angelo was a perfectly aloof older big brother to the two of them as Derrick showed the middle child syndrome fine and was perfectly at ease with being the center of the scene as Chris was perfectly fine with being a ball of energy around the two of them as they tried to get Chris out of a sugar rush...

Once that scene was done, they then swapped roles around to Screnton's liking and then got to play the roles they had auditioned for...Angelo had auditioned for Charlie, a best friend of Tyler who had snuck on board the family vacation trip, Derrick got to read for Cooper, the main unknown rival for Tyler and Chris soon read for Tyler himself...

Once all of them were done, Screnton looked over all of his notes and said, "Thank you very much, please wait in separate rooms here while I make a decision and inform you personally..." and then handed them room keys for the hotel, Chris taking his key and waiting in his hotel room for over an hour until the door opened and Screnton came in and said, "I'll be honest, I liked what I saw from your audition" as Tyler nodded and said, "Thank you sir"

Mr.Screnton soon put a bag down on the couch of the hotel room and said, "It's been said that I have quite an eye for spotting out good talent and I like what I saw in you however, I do have a slight problem" as Chris immediately got worried as he asked, "What problem do you have?"

"It's not a problem with you is that I have a problem with casting" Mr. Screnton said before continuing with a bit of tiredness, "I do not have any quality actors that could play Greg and Tommy, casting has been working nationwide and even into Canada to try to find kids that I liked for those roles and could act to my standards"

"That is a hard problem" Chris said to Screnton before he opened the bag and pulled out a bunch of pills saying, "Are you familiar with these?" Chris's eyes widened as he saw that he had regression pills on him and said, "I'm familiar with them" though was wondering why he needed to go this far...Regression pills had been out on the market for quite a while now, people knew about them and used for a variety of circumstances and here he was being offered the regression pills to play a 5-year-old, no 6-year-old kid in a family comedy?

"I know this seems a bit drastic, but I could see you had an instinctual grasp on how to play Tommy, Derrick had the same grasp on playing Greg but I cannot find anyone else that I like and can perform to my standards" Mr Screnton said with a tired tone to his voice as if he wanted to get this over with quickly and said, "If you are willing to do this, I am willing to cast you in any other production I put on, you want a role, you've got it, all that you would need to do is take the pills to get the role, I will owe you a fantastical debt for this, are you willing to accept this? Because I just casted Angelo as Tyler, if you don't take this offer, you don't get the role..."

And now Chris was in a dilemma, regression pills were monitored by the government, you'd have to register yourself as a user so that doctors could monitor you and make sure that when the time was right to reage you with age progression pills...

He needed to work with Screnton to get him into the main spotlight of Hollywood, the work he had put in into getting into the A-List could take a massive hit because if he didn't accept this offer, someone else would and they would happily take the rub that comes with working with Michael Screnton...

So what other choice could there be? Chris said, "Alright then, I'll do it" and took the pills that were handed to him and Screnton said, "Very good, I look forward to working with you in the future, Mr. Miles, expect the contract to be sent to your agent, and make sure to take those pills before you go to bed tonight, you have a free day in this hotel as well as a voucher for free room service dinner so use it wisely, now I need to go and talk to Derrick as I'll be casting him as Greg"

With that Mr. Screnton left the hotel room leaving Chris wondering if he just found exactly where he'd be willing to go to become a star in this business...

After getting a call from his agent who faxed him over the contract to sign and then signed it before getting a call that his agent would be around to pick him up in the morning after his pills were taken, Chris sighed before going to use that voucher to eat dinner before getting himself ready to sleep...

He ate the dinner with gusto before going to the shower and washed himself dry before taking the pills and going to bed naked...With how regression worked, his clothes wouldn't be able to fit him then...

So he slept and while he slept the regression pills did their work...

1251.content:
Olivia Parker couldn't believe she'd signed the contract. When she'd set out for Hollywood, she'd never imagined her first star role would be in a women in prison flick. Still, it was the star role and she was tired of playing bit parts. The fact she was being paid pretty handsomely for something that was essentially b-movie schlock didn't hurt either. She could kiss her agent for arranging such a sweet deal. If it wasn't for the money, she'd never have agreed to it, lead role or no.

She'd just returned from meeting with her agent and producer where she'd signed the contract and had been given a script to peruse. She didn't know whether to laugh or groan at the title,Big House Babes.

"My first title role and it's in a babes behind bars b-flick," she muttered to her thoughts aloud. Worst case, she could be the next Linda Blair or Pam Greer.

There was even an illustration on the cover, which Olivia assumed was some concept art. It showed a young woman in a rather skimpy looking prison outfit and chains. She was being escorted past rows of barred prison cells by two muscular men in guard uniforms.

As she examined the illustration, Olivia couldn't help thinking how much the woman looked just like her. They had the same shoulder length blond hair, green eyes, and athletic build. Even the structure the face looked like hers. Could they have drawn this for her, to show what her costume would be? But no, she'd just signed the contract an hour ago and was given the script, illustration and all, on the spot. There's no way they could've intentionally drawn it to look like her. It must just be one hell of a coincidence.

Putting the thought out of her mind, she sat down in her favorite chair in the living room and began to look over the script.

1331.content: And what kind of movie is it about?
1331.title: An 8-year old girl

choices: Daniel is called on his phone
13311.content:
Daniel Sandow was desperate. He was an actor, but he wasn't considered much of a celebrity. He was in plenty of movies, but he couldn't get anything more than a minor role. He was called upon by many casting directors, but never for any reason other to be that guy. That guy who was just, well, a guy. An average looking middle-aged man. All he ever did was stay in the background and look as insignificant as possible.

Needless to say, he was a little tired of this. However, his hopes were brightened when he heard some exciting news from the studio. To put it simply, the studio had commisioned these pills that could only be described as "magic". Apparently, a simple gulp of one could turn any actor into the perfect actor for a certain role. Nobody was quite sure how they worked, but they knew for sure they did. And Daniel wanted it more than anything.

He wanted one so badly, in fact, that he actually stole one. He wasn't sure how he got past security and got one of the thousand dollar miracle pills from the director's desk, but he did. So, there he was with the key to his success: a tiny pink pill.

Now, Daniel honestly had no idea what role the pill had in store for him or even what movie it was for. Finn Martins directed almost everything, from heavy war dramas to children's comedy. He honestly repected the director's abilities despite never getting a real part in any of his movies. Still, the fact stood that he had no idea what this pill would do to him. All he knew was that this had to be a major role, or else they wouldn't have made a pill for it.

"Oh well," he said to himself. "It's this are obscurity. After twenty eight years in Hollywood, I'm finally a real role, no matter."

So, in the movie studio's bathroom, Daniel Sandow swallowed the pink pill and sealed his fate. Whatever was going to happen, it had to be better than just being Customer #4.
13311.title: A simple kids movie

133111.content:
The pill didn't really have any taste to it, which Daniel kind of liked anyway. He didn't really feel anything different though.

"Man, if I did this for nothing...." he groaned as he began to walk out of the bathroom. This really sucked right now.

However, right at that moment, he felt a buzzing in his pocket; his cell phone was going off.

"Who could that be?" he asked himself as he picked up his phone. The name on the message instantly spoke to him: Finn Martins.

"H-Hello?" he asked as he opened the phone and brought it to his ear.

"Hello, this is Daniel Shallow correct?" asked the voice.

"Yes sir!" said Daniel, glad to hear from the famed director.

"Ah, good to hear from you Daniel. I remember you from that last movie you did with me." spoke the man with some pride. Daniel was a bit flattered to hear that the director remembered him, despite his role being nonexistent in that movie.

"Thank you sir. Is there something you needed to say?" asked Daniel.

"Ah yes, of course. I'm beginning to film a new movie later today. Since I remembered you, I wanted to know if you'd like a part in it." asked the director. Daniel was excited to hear that news. Finally, something good!

"I'd be glad to, sir! What's it called?" he asked.

"The movie is called "School Daze". It's a story featuring a couple of children, but we need adult stars too of course. You can get more details on the plot and script later. Filming starts at 3:00 this afternoon." said the director.

Daniel looked at his watch, seeing that it was about 11:30 right now. Plenty of time.

"That would be great, sir." said Daniel.

"Excellent." said Finn. "Now, feel free to head out to the break room where they have a catering table for the actors. It'd be nice to introduce yourself to them."

"Okay, sir." said Daniel. Apparently done, the director thanked Daniel again and hung up.

"Finally, something that might be worth the time." said Daniel as he happily walked out of the bathroom.

It would be worth his time all right.
133111.title: Daniel is called on his phone

1331111.content:
With satisfaction on his mind, Daniel strolled on over to the break room. The actor's break room, to be exact. He was never allowed there before, mainlt because the production staff never considered him much of an actor. But now, he already had the role. They had to let him in. And as soon as he reached the door, he was met by a security guard.

"I'm going to need to see your authorization, sir," the guard told Daniel.

"What kind of authorization, exactly?"

"Your driver's liscense would suffice."

"Okay, very well then," Daniel said while taking out his wallet. As he took out his liscense, he failed to take in that his wallet was a lightish red instead of its original brown. "Here you go sir."

The security guard inspected the liscense and made sure it matched the identity of one of the actors on his authorization list. He went through the information on the list and began to mentally check off the details.

Daniel Sandow? Check. Brown hair? Check. Green eyes? Check. Age 40? The guard looked at the actual man in front of him first to make sure he looked that age. He could see that his hair had a little grey strands, but still had plenty of color. Seemed about the right age. Check enough.

"Okay, Mr. Sandow, you can go now," the guard said while handing the man back his wallet.

"Thank you, sir." Daniel then proceeded to put his liscense back in his wallet and walked through the door. By now, his wallet was an unmistakably hot pink and was glittering. Not that it mattered to him. All he cared about right now was getting something for lunch. He was starving and that pill didn't quite hit the spot. As he walked on over to the fruit cart, Daniel's newly restored hair was starting to brighten to a golden blond.
1331111.title: The break room

13311112.content:
As Daniel walked towards the fruit section to start, he took notice of his growling belly. He was stupid to not eat much before coming here. Who doesn't eat before coming to work anyway? Well, it was a moot point now. He could eat now. He was so looking forward to it that he didn't even notice his wallet or hair, or even the fact that the guard had said that his license said 40 years old.

Anyway, as he grabbed a tray, someone bumped into him from behind.

"Oh, I'm sorry about that." said a male voice.

Daniel looked behind him to see a man of about 35 years or so. He looked good for his age though.

"Oh, it's no problem at all." said Daniel. "I'm Daniel Shallow." he said as he offered for a handshake.

"It's a pleasure. I'm Thomas Drake." said Thomas, grabbing a tray himself.

"So, are you in the movie too?" asked Daniel.

"You mean School Daze? No, I'm not honestly. However, someone I know is in it, so I was allowed to come by for moral support." said Thomas.

"Really? What kind of person?" asked Daniel.

"Oh, just a normal family member. Surely you understand." smiled Thomas. Daniel smiled.

"Of course." said Daniel. Anyway, as they got themselves some healthy things like fruit and all that good stuff, Daniel noticed that there was a section for some sweets. You know, candy and all that good stuff. Suddenly, that stuff looked very appealing to Daniel. He had as much a sweet tooth as any normal person, but his stomach seemed especially needing for something like that.

"Hmm, guess I'll get some of those." he smiled as he grabbed a handful of some bags of sweets and all that. Thomas chuckled behind him.

"You grab at candy like a little kid." said Thomas.

"Hey." laughed Daniel as the two left the food section and found themselves a seat together. As they did, Daniel couldn't see, but his license was now showing 35 years old on its front. The wallet was already pretty much changed. However, as he sat down, more stands of hair began turning to a golden blonde color, engulfing almost all of his hair, although it wasn't done yet. Also, beneath his long-sleeved shirt and jeans, the hair on his body was beginning to lesson, as strands of hair disappeared from his arms and legs, and any other place of consequence. Such a thing wouldn't be needed for later on.
13311112.title: Stopped by someone

133111121.content:
"So, I take it you're in the movie?" Thomas asked Daniel as the latter was stuffing his face with sweets.

"Mmm hmmm!" Daniel smiled back with a closed mouth full of cupcake. He really did seem to have the eating habits of a child.

"Well, what part do you have?"

Daniel swallowed the food in his mouth with a quick gulp and continued talking. "Well, I'm not too sure, really. All I know is that the director chose me personally and told me to come to the set at four. Must be a big one."

"Really?" Thomas looked at Daniel get another plate of chocolate syrup covered marshmellows. Weird. "Say, Daniel, think you should get something more, you know, healthy to eat before lunch?"

"Lunch? I thought this was lunch."

"You were planning on eating all those sweets for lunch?"

"Well, I don't like any of the fruit here and there's no real food here, so yeah," he brushed off while shoving another marshmellow in his mouth and brushing a strand of blond hair from his face. What he didn't notice was that said hair had become extra volumous and grown down to his neck. Even with its new lenghth, it certaintly looked better kept than his original scruffy hair.

"Well then, let's go. We're getting some real lunch somewhere."

"Really?" Daniel quickly wiped any chocolate that was present on his face. As he did, any facial hair he possessed was literally wiped from existance. His face was now as bare as as a baby's. "Like where?"
133111121.title: Talking with Thomas

1331111211.content:
"I know a good restaurant just a little ways from the studio." said Thomas as he looked at his watch. "It's noon right now, and the shooting isn't until 3 o'clock, so we've got time."

"What about that family member you said you were here supporting?" asked Daniel.

"Oh they're not here right now. I came early just in case they arrived." said Thomas.

"Makes sense." said Daniel, agreeing with Thomas.

With that settled, Daniel and Thomas walked through the studio normally, talking little tidbits every now and then. Daniel felt like Thomas was a good man, and he wanted to know a bit more about him. He did wonder a bit about Thomas' family. He wouldn't elaborate too much. Maybe he didn't like talking about them or something. Oh well, it was none of his personal business.

Anyway, as they walked out, Daniel passed by a woman on the way out. He did a brief double take though, as he appeared to be at eye level with the woman. He was normally pretty tall, far above most women. However, he could definitely see that he was eye level with that woman, who was probably at 5'4 or so.

"You alright?" asked Thomas.

Daniel turned to Thomas, and his eyes widened as he could see that Thomas was taller than him. However, Thomas didn't grow at all. If that woman was any indication, Daniel was shorter now.

"Um.....nothing...nothing at all." said Daniel, not wanting to worry Thomas.

Thomas didn't pay it any mind as they walked out to his Dodge Durango in the parking lot. Getting into the passenger seat, Daniel got his seat belt on and watched Thomas get his car started. For a brief second, Daniel wondered how he started the car, until realizing that that was simple car knowledge. How could he ever forget that? Perhaps all that sugar was going to his head.

Anyway, without incident, Thomas drove the two of them along. The restaurant he had in mind was a nearby Red Robin, which Daniel suddenly found himself very excited to see. He hadn't been there in a long time after all.

"This should be fun." he smiled to himself. He was so focused on it though that he didn't notice his hair grow even more, as his golden blonde locks now grew a tiny bit longer, finally stopping just below his shoulders in long soft strands of hair, looking as if it was taken care of daily.
1331111211.title: A Restaurant

choices: Daniel needs to use the bathroom
13311112111.content:
"Well, here we are," Thomas announced before he and Daniel exited the truck to head inside the Red Robin.

"Wow, it's been so long since I've been here," Daniel said in slight awe. "I don't think I can even remember what they have here."

"Well, I'm buying, so feel free to buy anything you want."

"Really? No matter how much?"

"Yeah, my family member I talked about earlier can really bring in the money. Besides, you seem like a nice guy."

Daniel was about to thank the man, but all that came out was "Awesome! Let's go!" As if the excited outburst wasn't strange enough, his voice actually rose a pitch when he did it.

As soon as they got inside, Daniel was actually having a little trouble deciding what to get. He knew he would really like to taste a BBQ Chicken Burger for the first time in years, but he didn't have the appetite for it. Maybe he ate a little too much candy.

"Well, whattya want, Daniel?" Thomas asked after already ordering his sandwich.

"Hmm... I'm honestly not that hungry right now. I think I'll just get the Cheesy Mac 'n Cheesy on the kids menu." Thomas couldn't help but laugh at the fact that he used the full name of the item.

Although it could have just been the candy making his appetite decrease, there was an even more obvious reason to it. Daniel's stomach was starting to cave in, losing much of his belly fat that started to redeposit itself into his hips. He did pride himself for his clean figure at age 28.
13311112111.title: Lunch time

133111121111.content:
Soon enough, the duo ended up ordering their meals together. After their menus were taken, they began to talk.

"I'm glad that she didn't see anything odd with you ordering from the kids menu." smiled Thomas.

"Why's that?" asked Daniel.

"Oh no problem, just glad that she didn't find it odd." he said. "So, I had an idea for where we could go after this."

"And what's that?" asked Daniel.

"You have a role in the new movie right? I was thinking that perhaps we could look for a possible wardrobe for you. My treat." said Thomas.

"Really? I mean that would be great, but I can pay myself." said Daniel.

"Oh I can handle it. I think you deserve it after all this time." said Thomas.

"Well, if you insist, although I'm not sure what clothes I'll need." said Daniel.

As they talked along, Daniel didn't really notice the restaurant getting a tiny bit smaller, as his stomach continued to cave in. He began regressing past 20 years old, looking very much like a young college student right now, although that wouldn't be where it would end.

Eventually, they got their meals, to which Daniel ate happily. Surprisingly, the tiny meal was enough for him and he felt full afterwards. He was a bit surprised but didn't have a problem with being full.

After that, they eventually paid for the meal.

"Well, shall we go?" asked Thomas.

"Sure. How much time do we have?" asked Daniel.

"It's 1:00 right now. Still two hours before shooting." said Thomas.

"Cool." said Daniel.
133111121111.title: Conversation while eating

1331111211111.content:
Before long, Daniel and Thomas had arrived at the local mall and were browsing the stores. Thomas kept on suggesting suits or at least good looking shirts to make a good impression on the director, but Daniel wasn't really paying attention to his suggestions.

"How about something pink?" Daniel suggested himself after a good three stores.

"Pink?" Thomas said puzzlingly. "Well, I suppose only real guys can wear pink. That'll make an impression on old Martins."

"You really think so?" Daniel was oblivious of the joke and instead took it as a genuine compliment. "Cool! Let's go!"

"Okay, okay! Slow down, boy," he chuckled. Thomas was just starting to think of his new friend as less of an equal. Not that he looked down at him, it's just that he felt more like Daniel was a responsibility. "So, should we look in Sear's first?"

"Oh! Look at that place!" Thomas shouted in a much higher voice than usual. In fact, it would easy to mistake for an adolescent girl's. Fittingly enough, he was pointing at a store meant for adolescent girls. Forever 13.

"Canwegotherecanwegotherecanwegothere?!"

"Heh, heh. Sure."

"Yay!" And with that, Daniel took off, shortening to an even five feet and sixteen years before entering.
1331111211111.title: To a new store

13311112111111.content:
The now younger Daniel continued to look through the wide variety of clothes meant for young girls, not once thinking about how odd it was. Only that something pink stood out to him.

"Now what to get?" he smiled to himself, his voice higher than normal.

Right after that, his eyes soon wandered over to a little pink dress made for little girls. It had an average skirt for that size, with straps since it wouldn't cover the shoulders. It looked like something you could normally wear in public.

"Oh, that looks cute." said Daniel as Thomas walked over.

"Yes it does. Why don't you try that on? And here's a white shirt I also found. You could wear the dress over that, given the sleeves and all." said Thomas, handing said shirt over to Daniel.

"Sounds good. Now what else do we need?" he asked.

After a bit, they continued to look. Daniel ended up grabbing a small set of pink panties made for a little girl, while Thomas also found a pair of white socks and some black mary janes for his feet.

"There you go. Try that on." said Thomas.

"Do we have the time?" asked Daniel.

"Oh, sure. It's only 1:30 right now. Still an hour and a half before shooting." smiled Thomas.

"Okay, if we have the time." smiled Daniel as he walked into the changing room.
13311112111111.title: Choosing clothes

133111121111111.content:
Daniel was more than excited to try on his new clothes, oblivious to how small they still were to his now smaller body. That didn't stop him from trying to put them on. He decided to start with his new pair of mary janes, so he took off his dusty loafers and tried slipping them on. Unfortunately, his feet proved too big at the moment.

"Stupid, pretty shoes," Daniel muttered to himself. "Get on right-OOF!" The struggle to get them on proved to be too dificult as he ended up slipping and falling on his face. Daniel started to cry softly.

Meanwhile, outside the dressing room, Thomas couldn't help but hear sobbing on the other side of the door.

"Daniel, are you okay?" he asked softly.

"No," the prepubescent female voice on the other side of the door sobbed. "I think my feet are to big!"

"Are you decent?"

"Yeah, all I did was take my old shoes off my disgusting large feet." More sobbing.

"I'm coming in." As he did so, all he could see was a thirteen year old boy (well, at least he recognized him as a boy) trying to hold off tears without wearing any shoes.

"Now, now," Thomas comforted. "Your feet aren't too big, see?" He then proceeded to slip on the mary janes on Daniel's feet without much effort. In fact, his feet were the perfect size! Nice and dainty, too, that went well with the pink nail polish on his toes.

Daniel took a look at the shoes Thomas had just put on his perfectly sized feet and smiled. "Thanks, dad," smiled Daniel Drake.
133111121111111.title: Changing Room

1331111211111111.content:
"So when can I wear the other clothes?" asked Daniel.

"How about we wait until we get back to the studio. You can keep the shoes on, but let's keep the clothes clean until shooting."

"Okay daddy."

Eventually, after checking out, the two of them were back in the color. Daniel was jumping a bit as he got into the car.

"Hey daddy, where are we going?!" asked Daniel.

"Well, it's close to 2:00 after all that shopping. Shooting begins in less than an hour." said Thomas.

"Oh." said Daniel.

"Don't worry. You'll have fun right?" smiled Thomas. "After all, the director's been very nice to you."

"I guess. But what if I mess up?" asked Daniel.

"You'll be fine. After all, you have Max Hall to help you." said Thomas.

Max Hall was a young boy who was playing the lead role in School Daze. Daniel was playing the role next to him. However, Daniel hadn't even met the boy yet.

"I hope he's not gross." groaned Daniel, making Thomas chuckle.

"Don't worry, I bet he'll be good." said Thomas. "You kind of remind me how your mother thought of me when we were kids."

"Daddy!" Daniel pounded his smaller fists into Thomas' backside, making the proud father chuckle.

After some time, they arrived back in the same studio parking lot. As Daniel opened the door, he actually had to jump a bit down, as he now had the appearance of a 10-year old boy, although that wasn't much thanks to the hair. His face was still softening as well.
1331111211111111.title: Checking out

13311112111111111.content:
As soon as the two arrived at the studio, Thomas helped lead his new son to his dressing room. Both couldn't help but feel a twinge of pride whenever they saw the plaque on the door saying 'Drake'. Both loved the advantages of the Hollywood.

"Wanna put your clothes on now?" Thomas asked the long haired boy next to him.

"You bet!" Daniel immediately dashed towards the changing curtain in the room. "Promise me you won't look!"

"Scout's honor, dear."

So, Daniel started to get rid of his old, ugly clothes and changed into his new ones. It was surprisingly easy to slip on, even the panties, despite being a little writhing at the crotch. One good look in the mirror next to him reminded him that he was really on top of the world. Sure, he wasn't the star of the movie, but he was more or less the co-star. Besides, he had the entire rest of his career to work towards a lead role!

"How do I look?" he asked Thomas.

"Wonderful," his dad replied before there was a knock at the door. After Thomas gave permission, the source of the knock revealed itself to be a young woman with the nametag 'Debbie'.

"It's about time you two go here," Debbie exclaimed. "Shooting's in twenty minutes and I still haven't been able to fix Daniel's face."

"Pardon?"

"I'm the makeup artist. I'm supposed to be doing Mr. Daniel here's makeup."

"Yay!" Daniel shouted with the most childishly girly shriek one could ever make. "Makeover!"

"Mr. Drake, if you would?"

"Of course," Thomas complied while stepping out the room and leaving his only child to the professional.
13311112111111111.title: Back in the studio

133111121111111111.content:
After Thomas left the room, Debbie was left alone with Daniel.

"How do you feel about your first big role? smiled Debbie.

"A bit nervous. I'm not even the main star." said Daniel.

"Don't worry. You'll be a main star someday soon. I hear that the director even has something to tell you after shooting today." said Debbie.

"Really? What is it?" asked Daniel.

"You'll find out. Now, let's get ready."

With that, Debbie began applying a tiny bit of make-up to Daniel's face. Being just a kid at this point, there was no need for lipstick or anything like that, just a little something for his cheeks perhaps and some cleaning up. As Debbie worked through his face, his features softened more. His lips became a bit pinker, while his nose and ears got smaller and cuter. His eyes remained the same blue color, although they got a little smaller. Eventually, Debbie showed Daniel his now very girlish looking face, to which he smiled and clapped his hands.

"Thanks ma'am!" he said.

"You're welcome. Now just one last thing." said Debbie. With that, she began coming through Daniel's hair, making it straight before beginning to rearrange it into twin pigtails on his sides.

"There, how does it look?" she smiled.

"Cute!" cheered Daniel, as he got a tiny bit smaller to fall to his final age of 8 years old.

"Great." said Debbie. "Well, looks like we're almost ready. Time to go."

With that, Debbie held Daniel's hand as they began to walk out of the room together.
133111121111111111.title: Makeover!

1331111211111111111.content:
"Ready?" Thomas asked as soon as Daniel and Debbie stepped out of the dressing room.

"Absolutely-tutely!" Daniel giggled. "Let's go make a movie!" Thomas tried grabbing his hand, but his eight year old son was already off without him.

They were somehow able to make it to set barely five minutes before shooting. Finn Martins looked rather anxious at first, but looked relieved as soon as he saw Daniel.

"Thank God you're family here," Martins said to the little Daniel. "I was afraid we were going to have to go off schedule."

"Sorry, Mr. Martins," Daniel apologized with the saddest puppy-dog face a human could make.

"It's okay, kid. Just try to be more careful next time. You read the script, right?"

"Of course, Mr. Martins!" Daniel answered enthusiastically. "I remembered it forwards and backwards and sideways!"

"Well, forward would be enough for now. Have you met Max yet?"

"Not really. He's the guy playing Sam, right?"

"Correct."

"The one I have to kiss at the end?"

"Yep, so it's probably best if you get aquainted with him. Who knows, maybe you two will have real chemistry," the director joked while chuckling a little bit. Thomas joined in a little bit on the laughter, also.

"I don't get it, what's chemistry?"

"Heh, heh, nothing. Mr. Hall's over there by camera 3. Feel free to talk."

"Might as well," Daniel shrugged as he started walking over to the young boy inspecting the large camera with great interest. He had to admit he was kind of cute as he kept nearing closer towards him. In fact, he was starting to look more and more cute as he kept on nearing. In fact, he was starting to feel tingly all over as soon as he got within talking distance. Strangely, it felt the most intense on his crotch. Now he really felt the need to talk to this boy.
1331111211111111111.title: On to shooting

13311112111111111111.content:
"Hey!" cried Daniel as he neared the boy.

The boy turned around to face Daniel. He appeared to be about the same age as Daniel, although a tiny bit taller. He was wearing a grey sweater over normal jeans and such. Perfectly normal for a boy.

"Hello. Are you "Dani"?" asked the boy.

"Yes, that's me!" giggled Danielle, or "Dani" as he called her. "But where did you hear that name?"

"Um....I think it was the big guy who told me that." he chuckled a bit before calming down. "I'm Max Hall by the way. So, I guess you and I will be out there soon."

"Yep. It's very nice to meet you." smiled Danielle, even curtseying a bit to the boy. Both of them had a good laugh at that.

"You're really funny, you know that?" laughed Max.

"Thank you." smiled Danielle. Danielle continued to feel some pulling at his groin area, but he just plain ignored it. The cameras were going to be on soon. His manhood was especially tiny now, only a little push away from full completion.

"Everyone! Shooting will begin soon!" cried one of the producers.

"That was fast." said Max. Danielle nodded before smiling at him.

"Just make sure you only kiss me on the cheek. Otherwise, daddy will get really get mad!" he giggled.

"I'll remember that." laughed Max.

As everyone got ready to go, and the stars were ready, the last remnants of manhood were fading away.
13311112111111111111.title: Talking

Mutant 5-year old girl with 300 IQ points for a sci fi movie...

14.title: Barbara Stewart (Age 55)

141.content: What kind of animal will Barbara's upcoming role require her to transform into?
141.title: A Middle Aged Animal Actress

1412.content:
Barbara's agent, Calvin Bishop, had been looking into different fantasy movie offerings from the various studios, from Disney to Paramount to Warner, and even some of those Chinese acquired studios. All scripts shown to him seemed pretty off the wall, so he may need to do some cajoling to convince her to accept.

Barbara Stewart acted in prestige cinema a decade ago, but hasn't accepted many roles in the intervening years, considering most to be "beneath" her stature as an artist. But as a result of her denial to accept much work, her income has suffered and her perilous financial situation may force her to lower herself and take what she can get. Money is money after all, even if it comes at the expense of art.
1412.title: An animal from fantasy

choices: Skip to after all of Barbara's human scenes are finished
Skip ahead to filming the movie
14121.content:
"What have you got for me, Cal?" Barbara stepped into her agent's office, lighting up a cigarette as soon as she sat down. She was dressed fashionably for her age and status, wearing sporty chic leggings, a blouse concealed by an expensive leather jacket, topped off with a silk head scarf and a pair of designer sunglasses shading her eyes.

"Well, I received a call from Disney and they were really, really interested in you," he ran his fingers over the printed script in rapid succession, "like first choice they thought of interested. Th-"

"That's not the first time I've heard that Cal. I'm artiste, my skills are always in demand. But the question is, is it worth it to me?"

"The money is worth it! They're offering a two million advance, eight million when it's complete. And! AND a 1% profit sharing deal! Think about it, that's more than you've made in the past decade. And to be really honest, if you don't take it I don't know for how much longer you can employ me as your agent. So I'm begging you, pleading with you, please hear this out. You haven't even heard the pitch."

Barbara looked at the left hand wall momentarily. "All right, what is it?"

"Disney is wanting to reboot the classic animated movie 'Sleeping Beauty' for live action, but the twist is it focuses on Maleficent is as the main character. Now if you're answer is 'no', Disney already told me they're prepared to go with their second choice, Angelina Jolie, for the part."

The premise piqued Barbara's interest, "I remember that movie when I was a little girl, let me see that script."

Parsing through the script didn't alleviate Barbara's concerns about the project. "Maleficent is good in this? Okay. I remember her being an evil, spiteful witch, but whatever, you can't have a villain as your protagonist in a major Hollywood production. She has a young, handsome man into turns into a raven as her companion, that might be fun." Reaching to the end climax brought a frown of disappointment. "Wait. She doesn't become a dragon at the end? Cal, can we get a script rewrite on this? If we can, I'll absolutely accept."

Calvin grinned at her enthusiasm, "I'll get right on the phone with Disney. We'll see what adjustments they're willing to make."

While Cal called the film's producers, Barbara pulled out a tiny makeup mirror, inspecting herself. She was always considered attractive in a classy kind of way. And for fifty-five years old, she did look pretty good, years of expensive beauty treatments have preserved her looks as best as they can. A few wrinkles here and there, and her once platinum blonde locks have grayed over time. But she could not deny the fact she looked fifty-five.

Cal returned to her a few minutes later. "Good news Barbara, Disney agreed to all of your demands! They're ready to begin filming in a month."

Barbara looked back at him, "Give it to me straight Cal, are you sure I can still play roles like this? It seems like the job for a woman twenty years younger."

"Come on Babs, that's no way to talk. With make-up and modern special effects, we could have you playing lead roles for another two decades. Really, you owe it to the world to give another patented Barbara Stewart performance."

The nickname "Babs" rankled Barbara a little, "I've told you before, Cal, don't call me Babs. I've always hated that nickname. But thank you for the words of encouragement, I'll take that with me on day one of filming."
14121.title: Maleficent Starring Barbara Stewart

choices: Barbara relents, and finishes the movie
Barbara scoffs him and goes on a rampage
141211.content:
"Cut! Print!" The director, Bobby Bergson shouted.

Barbara Stewart, still in full makeup and costume sat down, relieved. She had just finished filming all of her scenes for 'Maleficent'. Her feet ached and she was ready for some R&R during the movie's post-production before she would have to do the inevitable media circuit to promote the movie. But in the meantime, no more more waking up at 5 A.M. for two hours of makeup sessions and getting prosthetic horns glued onto her head. But she had to admit, she had some fun playing the devious fairy and her cast mates were pleasant enough.

Bobby came over to Barbara, shaking her hand enthusiastically. "It's been an honor and a pleasure working with you Ms. Stewart! It's not everyday a director gets to work with a two time Academy Award winner and four times nominated actor."

"Actually it's two Academy Awards, and five nominations, but who's counting?" Barbara was moderately flattered by the younger director. "So when do you need me in the recording booth for the dragon scenes? It's going to be CGI in post as is standard industry practice these days."

"Oh about that, James Rothstein, our producer, wanted a word with you. Something about plans for special effects. I didn't really know much about it, it's cutting-edge stuff he and the studio have been really wanting to try it out."

Not long after, James Rothstein did walk on set, approaching Barbara eagerly. "Okay, so we've shot most of the mover already, everything up to the climax and including the resolution. We just need to set up for the big scene. Here's the address to a place I need you to go to." He handed her a small card with an address and date: tomorrow at 1 P.M. "They'll get you all ready for your scene."

Barbara was caught off guard by Rothstein's curtness. "Bobby had told me you had plans for some kind of cutting-edge special effect, is this some new kind of CGI? Do you need me to do motion capture like with all the dots on my face?"

"You'll find out when you get there. Just be there on that time tomorrow."

Despite her reservations, Barbara did as she was told, she was a professional after all, and still under contract to boot.

* * *


Still unsure about all this, Barbara decided to call up Cal so he could come with her. He wasn't just her agent, Cal was a friend and confidant to her. And this place was not any kind of recording studio or CGI artist studio she had ever heard of.

They pulled up in the parking lot in one of Barbara's expensive little sports cars. The address was correct as far as they could tell. Barbara looked at her wrist watch: 12:52, early, but not too early.

"I think this is the right place," Cal said. It was large building, industrial looking, with a high roof and very large air conditioner units on top. Blue and red colored tubes rose from the ground and reached the roof, while at the ground bent sideways to carry whatever was inside to the other side of the facility. Very large service entrances with garage doors dotted the side of the building opposite of the pipes.

The pair walked inside where they were greeted by a secretary. "I, apparently have an appointment here according to James Rothstein." Barbara told the receptionist.

She looked younger, maybe late twenties or early thirties; then her eyes saw down at her clipboard, "Barbara Stewart for the one o'clock consultation? Right this way."

This place was so strange, they haven't even said what they were or had a sign posted anywhere. Barbara looked at Cal who only widened his eyes, looked away, and awkwardly reshuffled his jacket before following Barbara who followed the receptionist. They were led back past a couple of metal swinging doors where a man in a lab coat and James Rothstein were conversing.

"And this will give us the results we're looking for?" James asked the man.

"It's not been completely tested yet, but that's what you and the Disney corporation have been funding our research for. But all of our estimates say it should." This answer was good enough for James.

"Ahh Barbara come here. Meet Dr. Taylor, he'll be prepping you for your final scene tomorrow back on the set."

Barbara nervously stepped forward. "What is this place? And what do you do here, Mr.- Dr. Taylor." She stumbled on his title.

"This is Horzene Biotechnology and Research Labs." A technician or another doctor came from beyond presenting a hypodermic needle.

"What is this? Are you seriously injecting me with something weird substance!?"

James, in a surprising bit of calmness answered, "Now Barbara, this is a simple procedure to help you fulfill your contractually obligated role. If you want your eight million dollar payout and the 1% profit share you'll do it."

Barbara looked back to Cal for his opinion. Cal gritted his teeth, "It's highly unorthodox... but I... think you need to go through with it Barbara."

Now it was Barbara's turn to grit her teeth, only she did not purse her lips, refusing to betray her true feelings. "Fine," she uttered. Dr. Taylor took the syringe from the technician and applied it to Barbara's arm.

Upon being injected Barbara started to feel strange. Her vision blurred and her skin felt itchy and burning, more so than she'd ever felt in her life. "What the hell was in that syringe!?"

Dr. Taylor answered back, "A mutagenic cocktail of specially engineered genetic components. We included many kinds of reptile material and bat."

"I'll sue you for this!" Barbara threatened at the top of her lungs.

The mutation was taking rapid effect. Barbara's skin that hereto been itching and burning began to peel out as black scabrous material erupted from underneath: scales. Barbara's eyes became cross-eyed looking at the center of her face as her nose and mouth elongated into a muzzle. On the opposite side of her body, Barbara felt a racking pain build down from her lower spine and backside as a tail extended from her pant leggings, breaking a clear hole through as the tail quickly gained length and girth. Small wings, a result of the bat DNA, sprouted from her back, initially straining her white shirt before making holes in that garment too.

"Grrrrrrrr!" Barbara bellowed a beastial growl as her finger nails sharpened into claws, her toes following in the same order, breaking her casual high heels to shreds. Then her entire body was growing in both height and width and two sharp horns burst through the back of her skull. Her clothes finally ripped off, leaving Barbara completely nude; however her nipples and breasts had all ready evaporation and covered by rich bed of purple scales.

"We also included dinosaur DNA in the cocktail to achieve a greater size and mass," remarked Dr. Taylor.

"Where did you get dinosaur DNA?" Cal said, terrified at the whole situation.

"Have you ever seen a little movie called Jurassic Park?" Dr. Taylor replied.

"RRRRrrrrrrrroooooooooooorrrrrr!!!!!" Barbara roared out. Her increased mass and weight forced her position to all fours. Her eyes had taken on an eerie green-yellow glow. Her body was clad entirely in black scales with the exception of her underbelly possessing purple ones. Her hands and feet were equally black claws, while her rump and tail with thick added mass. Throughout the entire transformation, Barbara continued to swell in size and height and length; however, her small wings refused to keep up with her growth, they would remain too stunted to ever allow her flight. But this was likely by Horzene's design, according to Disney's demands.

Barbara's growth finally tapped out twenty-one feet, three inches of height and thirty-two feet, seven inches in length from snout to tail. Finally, Barbara let loose one last bellowing roar, this one bigger than the last two, "RRRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR!!!!!!!!!!!!" Green flames shot out of Barbara Stewart's new maw, singeing one of the facility's walls.

"The fire breathing was really the hardest part. We had to design a custom organ from scratch and embed that genetic code into the cocktail." Dr. Taylor said aloud, but mostly to James Rothstein.

Once Barbara had calmed down on her own, Cal meekly spoke up "Barbara? Can you understand me?"

Barbara, now in the spitting image of Maleficent's dragon form looked down at her agent. "Cccalvin." She found it momentarily hard to speak with this new mouth.

"Barbara, you can still talk? How do you feel? Do you need help?" Cal wanted to help his client and friend in anyway he can.

"Ap ap ap ap!" James interjected. "We now have a real life dragon for our movie, Barbara, we still need you on set tomorrow for the shoot. You have to do this, you agreed according your contract. If you want those eight million dollars you'll come with me."

Barbara's demeanor was instantly angry. Here she was transformed against her will for a movie and this sleazy producer was still trying to involve her in his affairs. Her countenance furious, she was staring down a movie producer on what a dragon such as her should do next.
141211.title: Barbara Becomes the Dragon

145.content:
Barbara pushed the script back at her agent in disgust.

"Nope, not interested."

He sweated through his khaki suit, running his fingers through his bright orange hair in a panic. Clearly he hadn't expected her to say no, and perhaps made some promises he shouldn't have.

"Ah, come on, Barbara! It's gold, and you know it!"

"Yeah, but no one wants to see a fifty-five year old woman running around in hot pink tights, no matter how famous she used to be."

"How famous she is. And are you kidding me? Who wouldn't want to see ol' Babs Stewart back on the big screen?"

"Don't call me Babs. I always hated that nickname."

The agent put his hands on the table, sliding the script back her way. Barbara looked off, indifferent.

"The guys making this one are super passionate about getting you in this role. They're willing to do anything to make it happen. And I mean, look at the project. It's the kind of story that's a complete 180 for you, sure, but it's exactly what your career needs right now. You could be making movies a lot worse than this. This role could put you back in the spotlight, Barbara."

"It's an old dog playing new tricks, Cal."

Barbara glanced at the mirror on the wall over her shoulder. A few more wrinkles creased in her frown, only adding to her grievances. Cal took her hand over the table, drawing her attention away from her fading features.

"Please, Barbara. You don't know how perfect this could be for you. It's a change from all those small budget indie films you've been doing to pass the time. It's the chance for you to come back to the limelight where you belong."

"But a superhero movie, Cal? Honestly? That role's written for someone practically forty years younger than me!"

"You'd be surprised what a good makeup team can do."

"Makeup's not enough anymore, Cal. I'm gonna need something a whole lot stronger than a little powder."

"Trust me, if you take this job, there won't be any problem making you look your absolute best. You bring the power to this role, and I swear to you everything else will work out fine. I'd bet my entire fortune, nay my entire life on it."

Barbara sighed and looked her old friend in the eyes. He'd been with her since the very beginning, when they'd both been starting out. How either of them hadn't left the partnership long ago was still a mystery to her. Still, if Cal made a bet, he meant it. He never gambled with her career before now, so he wouldn't be starting now. Yet she couldn't shake her worries about becoming this character. She definitely resonated with the struggling young super girl they wanted her to play, and there were some interesting emotional high points that definitely drew on her skills honed as an actress for thirty plus years, but could they pull it off without her looking ridiculous? Could she really trust Cal on this?

"…I'll give it a try, but only because you haven't let me down yet, Cal."

"Thanks, Barbara. You won't regret it, I'm sure."

That remains to be seen, she thought.

"One more thing for you, Barbara. I know how much you like getting into character beforehand, so here's a little piece from the prop team. It's Cosmodia's necklace. Maybe wearing it will help set your mind at ease about this whole thing."

"Yeah yeah."

She took the clunky charm from Cal's hands. Boy, was it weighty. Barbara let Cal clasp it for her, then turned around to look at herself in the mirror. The shimmering stone chunk around her neck looked strange compared to the waifish old body wearing it. She felt foolish. Cal seemed happy, of course. Barbara tucked the necklace beneath her scarf out of embarrassment. She then bid Cal adieu and walked out of the agency with a troubled mind. What was she getting herself into?

1551222122121.content:
In the offices of Tantamount Studios in Hollywood, California, director Jack Pierce, and Actor Johnny Tremaine were sulking in deep thought.

"None of these actresses are good enough, Jack." Johnny screamed. "Where's the chemistry? Where is the passion? How are we going to make "Hearts on the Water" if we can't find a partner for me?"

Jack sighed. Hearts on the Water was a hell of a script, a movie about a 30 year old woman who decides to go on a vacation with her friends to get away from the man that broke her heart, only to find new love on the island, that man being superstar Johnny Tremaine. Thing about this script though, was that it really was a hell of a script. So good, in fact, that some people believed that this little romance movie could go on to make millions, and even win some awards, as well as turn Jack and Johnny into superstars of their respective fields.

However, the movie succeeding was completely dependent of the female lead. And they went through all the major actresses that they thought could play the role. But none of them took it seriously enough, and none of them have chemistry with Johnny.

"Johnny, calm down. I have an idea I've been wanting to try for a while..." Jack said as he got up.

Johnny looked curiously as Jack retrieved a bottle of pills from the desk drawer across the room.

"What the hell are those? Drugs?" Johnny asked.

"The latest in special effects technology." Jack said. "You got to keep this secret, Johnny."

"Sure, just explain them to me."

"Looking for away to improve on even computer technology, scientists devised this little pill, which will transform the person who ingests into whatever we desire. Could be an alien, a dog..." Jack started.

"... or a woman..." Johnny said.

"Exactly. So, here's my plan. We find a boy...."

"Why a boy?"

"Because with a boy into a woman we have more freedom of change. It's all very complex, I don't want to get into it. Anyways. We get a boy. An Orphan or something, some kid who doesn't have a life ahead of him. We bring him with us to Hawaii, say he is in the movie, give him this pill, boom, turn him into the actress of our dreams."

Johnny pondered the idea.

"Hell, you could even marry her if you wanted." Jack said.

Johnny's eyes lit up.

"Is it safe?"

"No harm done, unless it gets into the wrong hands. So no one can know about this." Jack said.

"Johnny Tremaine will keep his lips sealed." Johnny replied.

And so the duo worked in secret to bring this reality to life. They found the perfect candidate, a young boy named Trent Woods, and brought them along to Hawaii. To the press, they told the had hired some complete unknown, and would be revealing her on the first day of shooting.
1551222122121.title: He thinks he's a 30-year old actress

15512221221211.content:
Trent Woods was a simple 8-year old boy. His parents had abandoned him at a very young age, young enough for him not to remember them at all. For the better part of his life, he lived at the Little Ones Orphanage in California. Life was simple for him; he had friends and good teachers and all of that. He was honestly looking forward to being an adult. In fact, he remembered when he got approached.

*****A few days earlier*****

Trent saw a man approach the front desk of the orphanage. He was asking to look around the children, wanting to have one star in a movie. However, he told the lady at the desk to not mention that to any of the kids, just so they didn't riot. Of course, the man was allowed to, and he saw Trent off to the side. The man smiled, walking over to him.

"Hello little one. What's your name?" he asked.

"Trent Woods." the 8-year old smiled at him.

"Wonderful to meet you Trent. I'm Jack Pierce. I'm here on business, looking around." said Jack. "Tell me Trent, what do you look forward to in life?"

Trent was a little confused, but he answered honestly. "I can't wait to grow up. I want to be an adult." he smiled.

"Really? You like the idea of adulthood?" smiled Jack.

"Yeah, like all those adults who get to do whatever they want. Do you think I can be a good adult?" asked Trent.

"Of course Trent." smiled Jack. What luck for him. He already found his star. "In fact, I have a proposal for you......"

*****End flashback*****

So Trent was offered a chance to play a small role in the movie "Hearts on the Water". He didn't quite fully understand the plot, but he was okay with that. He was going to be in a movie after all! Wait til he could tell this to his friends back at the orphanage.

Anyway, the plane had landed in Hawaii, a place Trent had never been to before. Right now, it was June 8, and shooting was scheduled to begin on June 14, which was six days from then. Right now, mostly everyone was staying in hotels, Trent included. After their first night in Hawaii, Trent had woken up and got some room service for breakfast. He was surprised that he could get food like this. It was so cool for him.

Right after he finished breakfast and turned the TV on, Jack knocked on the door. Trent allowed him in.

"Hello, my little child star. How are you?" smiled Jack.

"I'm good sir. I've never been here before." smiled Trent.

"That's great." said Jack before sitting down. "Now, six days from now, on June 14, we'll begin shooting." he started.

"Uh huh, and I'm playing a little kid who has that little role, right?" asked Trent.

"Yes, you are." smiled Jack. "However, although it's small, we take our work very seriously. So, we need to make sure you're ready to go for your part." he said, pulling out a familiar bottle of pills.

"What are those?" asked Trent.

"These are pills that we generally give to newer actors. It helps them fit in." said Jack. "And you're new, so you have to take one of these a day. There's enough for the week in there."

"I see." said Trent, taking the bottle. He was eager to show that he could do it. Jack picked him out of an orphanage, so he didn't want to disappoint. He took off the top of the bottle and took one pill out.

"I'll leave you to it then." said Jack as he smiled and left, knowing that things were in motion now.

Trent waved good bye and ate the pill in one gulp, getting some water to help wash it down.

155122212212111.content:
Trent paused for a moment after the taking the pill, his 8 year old mind imagining all the magical things it could do to make him a better actor.

Sadly, though, nothing special seemed to happen. Trent wasn't really disappointed, though. He knew nothing really magical could happen to him like that. He was sure that the pill was making something happen inside of him.

"Well, time to relax." Trent said, as he looked around his giant hotel room.

Trent was excited to be in the giant hotel room, doing whatever he wanted to, like an adult! This place was much, much nicer than anything he had ever seen in his life before. He was really living life like an adult now!

So, Trent went back and enjoyed the cartoons he was watching on the TV just now. And even though he didn't feel anything happening before, the pill was indeed starting its process as it landed in his stomach, started to digest, and began its movement through the body.

On the top of Trent's head, a couple strands of black hair started to grow lighter in color. They were hardly noticable unless someone was either looking very closely, or looking to find lighter hairs on his head, but they were there. Small, tiny hairs changing color. And there was still much more to come for young Trent.

Trent stayed in his seat and watched about three or so episodes of the cartoon that was being marathoned on TV. Suddenly, there was another knock on the door.

"Who could that be now?" Trent said as he went to answer.

Who was at the door now?

1551222122121111.content:
Johnny Tremaine stood at the door as Trent opened it. He smiled at the kid.

"Hello Trent. I'm Johnny Tremaine. I don't believe we've been acquainted yet." he said as he offered a hand to shake. Trent eagerly accepted it once he heard the name.

"Oh, you're Johnny? The famous one?" asked Trent in giddiness.

"The very one." smiled Johnny.

"Cool!" said Trent. Anyway, after that, Trent let Johnny in, getting them both something to drink. Johnny looked real closely at Trent. He could barely see the faint traces of blonde hair through his dark ones. He realized then that it really was working.

"Wow." he said to himself so Trent couldn't hear.

"So, do you need something?" asked Trent. Johnny put his thoughts aside and shook his head.

"Oh, nothing really. Just figured I'd meet the kid that everyone was so happy to see. You're going to do great." said Johnny.

"Cool. I like this already." smiled Trent. They both had themselves a good time, enjoying what time they had before shooting began. Johnny wondered just what kind of person Trent was going to become. At least, like Jake said, he was an orphan, and he was getting a better life out of this.

"Anyway, looks like it's past noon now. Want to catch some lunch with me?" Johnny suggested.

"Sure, thanks!" smiled Trent.

With that, both of them got ready and walked down the hotel, going outside to a car Johnny had rented for his personal use.

155132.content:
Trent Woods is a very promising child actor, at the age of eight. He had been on cameo roles much of the time, but never been on a main role he always desires to be one. He had to go through the auditions to get the part, but lucky this time around, he gets a chance to play the main character in a size related story.

He may already been smart right from the start, and thought it was gonna be some special effects with green screen and all. But that’s not the case when the film crew has some interesting surprise for Trent, something which he’s fully unaware of this situation.

info.brief_description: An actor signs for a film, not realizing that they'll have to literally transform for it!
info.description:
In this interactive, you will follow the story of an actor or actress that signs on for a hot new film role, only to find out that they won't be transforming for their role by using traditional make-up or CGI effects. In fact, they'll have to physically, and possibly mentally, transform into their new role through some sort of magical process!

Now, who exactly transforms, be it an up and coming star looking for any role or an aging star looking to make a comeback, and what they transform into, be it an animal transformation or a age transformation or a fictional transformation or whatever, and how they transform, fast or slow, or even if they know they are transforming, is all up to you! Tell the story you want to tell!

- No killing
- Sex is allowed, but only if it is non graphic.
- Weight gain is only allowed if you make sure it fits the movie the actor or actress is acting in
- Cursing allowed.
- Have fun!

Be creative! This is the world of movies, after all!
